title: Brew It the Umi Way: Step-by-Step Matcha Latte Guide
excerpt: A simple, barista-level method to make a smooth, creamy matcha latte at home—Umi style.
content: Making matcha at home is easy when you follow a few fundamentals. Start by sifting 2–3 tsp of Umi matcha into a bowl to remove clumps and ensure a silky texture. Add about 30 ml of warm water (not boiling—aim for ~70–80°C) and whisk briskly in a zig-zag motion until the matcha is smooth and lightly frothy. Pour in hot or cold milk of your choice (dairy or plant-based both work beautifully). Finish by adding a sweetener to taste—honey, simple syrup, or jaggery for a deeper note. Pro tip: Use a bamboo chasen for the best foam, and adjust matcha and milk ratios to dial in your preferred strength. Prefer to follow along? Watch the full tutorial here: https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/13uVij4DsZk
author: Umi Team
